text: 5|36|bulsinhaneun jadeul-eun man-yag i sesang-ui modeun geos-i geudeul-ui geos-imyeo geugeosgwa gat-eun geos-eul soyuhago issdago hayeo simpan-ui nal geugeos-eul bachyeo bosanghalyeo hadeolado geudeul gaunde eoneu nugudo sulagdoeji anh-eul geos-imyeo go tongseuleoun beolman-i iss-eul geos-ila
